summary: The module provides abstract parser classes that form the core of the secrets scanning system, handling the reading of text streams, grouping of related lines (including multi‑line blocks) based on delimiters and comment handling, and scanning each line for potential secret values while respecting exclusion patterns.
business_intent: Facilitate automated detection of hard‑coded secrets in source code and configuration files by supplying reusable parsing logic for both single‑line and multi‑line secret patterns.
